titleStmt.title: By the King a proclamation concerning the king's euill.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1603-1625 : James I)
James I, King of England, 1566-1625.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Robert Barker, Printer to the Kings most Excellent Maiestie,

notesStmt.note: None to come for healing between Easter and Michaelmas.
"Giuen at White-hall the xxv. day of March, in the fourteenth yeere of Our Reigne of Great Britaine, France and Ireland, And of Scotland the nine and fourtieth."
Reproduction of original in: Society of Antiquaries.
